author: billbarker
msg: Add the port to the Host header.
Now Watchdog can run under either Java Http Connector.
Hopefully, it will also stop people from trying to "fix" the port handling on the Connectors.

author: nacho
msg: * Fix: for parse host header was giving the socket port when a host header was present without one
